dct_title_s: Betts's new map of India, Birmah, the Punjaub and part of Afghanistan.
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:5,000,000 ; (E 67째--E 96째/N 38째--N 5째). Relief shown by hachures. Indicates British Posessions, States Under British Protection, and Independent States. Shows roads, railroads, and telegraph lines.
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dcat_keyword_sm: Administrative and Political Divisions India Maps
